channel.title: Help with source i downloaded?
channel.description:
Okay so i downloaded this source to check out and maybe run it. But when you try to run it it comes up with a error.
Communications link failure
The last packet successfully received from the server was 1,293,923,492,563 mill iseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 1 millisecond s ago. Unable to connect to MySQL Press any key to continue . . .
I was told i need to remove MySQL setting in player.java, client.java, server.java. But i have no idea how to do it. I've tried and got 4 errors when i compiled it. I hope someone has the solution. :) does anyone know about MySQL and how to remove it?

item.title: Help with source i downloaded?

Str2own99, I’m a moderator not a wannabe. If you’re not going to post something helpful to the OP’s question don’t post.
[/quote]thanks for the warning sissie btw nice speach^ did ur mom write it for u since ur a chubby nerd?[/quote]
Grow up

@OP Remove all the Mysql.

Okay so i downloaded this source to check out and maybe run it. But when you try to run it it comes up with a error.

Communications link failure

The last packet successfully received from the server was 1,293,923,492,563 mill
iseconds ago. The last packet sent successfully to the server was 1 millisecond
s ago.
Unable to connect to MySQL
